_sText:
NOTE: THIS IS ONLY IN ALPHA STAGE, PLEASE DO NOT COMPLAIN ABOUT ANY GLITCHES.

Hey, this is an alpha stage release of Robot Wars, seeing as it is early in development, there are a few glitches, such as the camera not working on the second round.  However, hopefully some of you will know of a fix, or at least I can get you interested in the map.  Robots from the show include Hypnodisc, Panic Attack, Nemesis, and, for you retro robot-warers, Roadblock (Season 1, saw on the the front for convenience).

When a robot is destroyed its owner is killed (unless they noclipped out of their box -_-), and a fully functional pit that players can activate by driving into the pit release button (it has a down arrown next to it).

Enjoy the alpha stage release!


[By Starving Hobo]
